import React, { useState } from 'react' import RTCMultiConnection from 'rtcmulticonnection' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { useRouteMatch } from 'react-router' import { Form, Button, Row, Col, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' function StudentPage() { const history = useHistory() const match = useRouteMatch() console.log('history', history) console.log('match', match) let roomId = match?.params?.uuid || 1 console.log('roomId', roomId) const [show, setShow] = useState(true) const handleClose = () => setShow(false) // const handleShow = () => setShow(true) const handleSubmit = () => { const connection = new RTCMultiConnection() console.log('object', connection) connection.socketURL = 'https://rtcmulticonnection.herokuapp.com:443/' connection.session = { audio: true, video: true } connection.sdpConstraints.mandatory = { OfferToReceiveAudio: true, OfferToReceiveVideo: true, } roomId = connection.token() connection.openOrJoin(roomId) handleClose() } return (
JOIN CLASS ROOM
Name
Camera
Micro

Student
) } export default StudentPage
